Character¶

class Character¶

Abstract base class for all characters in the game.

Defines common attributes like name, HP, and attack power, as well as common behaviors like taking damage.

Subclassed by Hero, Monster

Public Functions

Character(std::string name, int hp, int attackPower)¶

Constructor for Character.

パラメータ:

  • name -- The name of the character.

  • hp -- The initial (and maximum) hit points.

  • attackPower -- The base attack power.

virtual ~Character() = default¶

Virtual destructor.

virtual void attack(Character &target) = 0¶

Pure virtual function for attacking a target.

パラメータ:

target -- The character to attack.

virtual void takeDamage(int damage)¶

Inflicts damage on the character.

Reduces HP by the specified amount. HP will not drop below 0.

パラメータ:

damage -- The amount of damage to take.

bool isDead() const¶

Checks if the character is dead.

戻り値:

true if HP is 0 or less, false otherwise.

std::string getName() const¶

Gets the character's name.

戻り値:

The name of the character.

int getHp() const¶

Gets the current HP.

戻り値:

The current hit points.

int getMaxHp() const¶

Gets the maximum HP.

戻り値:

The maximum hit points.

int getAttackPower() const¶

Gets the attack power.

戻り値:

The attack power.

Source Code

Header (include/models/Character.h):

 1#ifndef CHARACTER_H
 2#define CHARACTER_H
 3
 4#include <string>
 5#include <iostream>
 6
 7/**
 8 * @brief Abstract base class for all characters in the game.
 9 *
10 * Defines common attributes like name, HP, and attack power,
11 * as well as common behaviors like taking damage.
12 */
13class Character {
14public:
15    /**
16     * @brief Constructor for Character.
17     *
18     * @param name The name of the character.
19     * @param hp The initial (and maximum) hit points.
20     * @param attackPower The base attack power.
21     */
22    Character(std::string name, int hp, int attackPower);
23
24    /**
25     * @brief Virtual destructor.
26     */
27    virtual ~Character() = default;
28
29    /**
30     * @brief Pure virtual function for attacking a target.
31     *
32     * @param target The character to attack.
33     */
34    virtual void attack(Character& target) = 0;
35
36    /**
37     * @brief Inflicts damage on the character.
38     *
39     * Reduces HP by the specified amount. HP will not drop below 0.
40     *
41     * @param damage The amount of damage to take.
42     */
43    virtual void takeDamage(int damage);
44
45    /**
46     * @brief Checks if the character is dead.
47     *
48     * @return true if HP is 0 or less, false otherwise.
49     */
50    bool isDead() const;
51
52    /**
53     * @brief Gets the character's name.
54     * @return The name of the character.
55     */
56    std::string getName() const;
57
58    /**
59     * @brief Gets the current HP.
60     * @return The current hit points.
61     */
62    int getHp() const;
63
64    /**
65     * @brief Gets the maximum HP.
66     * @return The maximum hit points.
67     */
68    int getMaxHp() const;
69
70    /**
71     * @brief Gets the attack power.
72     * @return The attack power.
73     */
74    int getAttackPower() const;
75
76protected:
77    std::string name; ///< The name of the character.
78    int hp;           ///< Current hit points.
79    int maxHp;        ///< Maximum hit points.
80    int attackPower;  ///< Base attack power.
81};
82
83#endif // CHARACTER_H

Implementation (src/models/Character.cpp):

 1#include "models/Character.h"
 2
 3Character::Character(std::string name, int hp, int attackPower)
 4    : name(name), hp(hp), maxHp(hp), attackPower(attackPower) {}
 5
 6void Character::takeDamage(int damage) {
 7    hp -= damage;
 8    if (hp < 0) hp = 0;
 9    std::cout << name << " took " << damage << " damage!" << std::endl;
10}
11
12bool Character::isDead() const {
13    return hp <= 0;
14}
15
16std::string Character::getName() const {
17    return name;
18}
19
20int Character::getHp() const {
21    return hp;
22}
23
24int Character::getMaxHp() const {
25    return maxHp;
26}
27
28int Character::getAttackPower() const {
29    return attackPower;
30}
